original_text: all their valiant men marched through the night to Beth Shan. They took down the bodies of Saul and his sons from the wall of Beth Shan and went to Jabesh, where they burned them.
korean_text: 모든 장사들이 일어나 밤새도록 달려가서 사울의 시체와 그의 아들들의 시체를 벧산 성벽에서 내려 가지고 야베스에 돌아가서 거기서 불사르고

sentences.original_text: all their valiant men marched through the night
They took down the bodies of Saul and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사울과 그 아들들의 시신을 내려왔다

sentences.original_text: from the wall of Beth Shan
